data.expected_result: A lock icon appears next to the channel as it's no longer a public channel
data.short_description: Lock doesn't show up on text channels when denying "Read Text Channels & See Voice Channels" permission for the `@everyone` role
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a server where at least one channel is public - Go to Server Settings > Roles - Turn off "Read Text Channels & See Voice Channels" for the `@everyone` role - Ensure you have permission still to view the channel - Look at the channel's icon
